about_the_game:
PAIcom! The funniest and best furry voice computer assistant there is!
[Also the first furry (protogen) computer assistant in the world!]
Using your microphone you can talk to him! (Creator note: It is very nice to talk to an AI when you don't have friends!)
He can open apps, games, websites on your computer and much more! (+ he can be fully modded!!!)
Works on desktop and VR



So... why purchase PAIcom?
PAIcom is very FUNNY!!

He has a joke for all the voice commands he has!

He is very fast!

Source: trust me bro

PAIcom can be FULLY MODDED (without coding knowledge)
Yes, you heard me right! MOD PAICOM!

You are be able to change PAIcom's name, skin, responses, voice, etc!
YOU are be able to even make your OWN VOICE COMPUTER ASSISTANT using PAIcom's "engine"!
ISN'T THAT EXCITING?

COMPATIBLE WITH Steam VR, SlimeVR and even PiShock

PAIcom works in any vr form however it works the best with SteamVR!
You can tell PAIcom to change your Steam status, open Steam/Steam vr games and... if you are in a Full Body Tracking game with the SlimeVR trackers, you can tell PAIcom to calibrate them real fast if they drift!
And you already know what PiShock does...

Okay so how do you afford this?
I can't afford it lmfao.
So buy it!!!! ':D



Made by Ovidiu Dendrino / scripter S (I am working on this since 2020 help)
Voiced by Ovidiu Dendrino / scripter S
3D Model made by Nukude and modified by Ovidiu Dendrino / scripter S
Protogen species made by Malice-Risu (@CoolKoinu)
Discord icon made by Poketto Monsta and modified by Ovidiu Dendrino
detailed_description:
PAIcom! The funniest and best furry voice computer assistant there is!
[Also the first furry (protogen) computer assistant in the world!]
Using your microphone you can talk to him! (Creator note: It is very nice to talk to an AI when you don't have friends!)
He can open apps, games, websites on your computer and much more! (+ he can be fully modded!!!)
Works on desktop and VR



So... why purchase PAIcom?
PAIcom is very FUNNY!!

He has a joke for all the voice commands he has!

He is very fast!

Source: trust me bro

PAIcom can be FULLY MODDED (without coding knowledge)
Yes, you heard me right! MOD PAICOM!

You are be able to change PAIcom's name, skin, responses, voice, etc!
YOU are be able to even make your OWN VOICE COMPUTER ASSISTANT using PAIcom's "engine"!
ISN'T THAT EXCITING?

COMPATIBLE WITH Steam VR, SlimeVR and even PiShock

PAIcom works in any vr form however it works the best with SteamVR!
You can tell PAIcom to change your Steam status, open Steam/Steam vr games and... if you are in a Full Body Tracking game with the SlimeVR trackers, you can tell PAIcom to calibrate them real fast if they drift!
And you already know what PiShock does...

Okay so how do you afford this?
I can't afford it lmfao.
So buy it!!!! ':D



Made by Ovidiu Dendrino / scripter S (I am working on this since 2020 help)
Voiced by Ovidiu Dendrino / scripter S

name: PAIcom (furry computer assistant)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: i3 4th generation CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A GPU that actually works
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 369 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Works with any audio card (may require external microphone)
  • VR Support: Works in Desktop and VR
  • Additional Notes: You need a microphone (to make the assistant hear you) + English (United States) [Speech Language Pack] installed
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: i7 2nd generation CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A GPU that actually works good
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 369 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Works with any audio card (may require external microphone)
  • VR Support: Works in Desktop and VR
  • Additional Notes: You need a microphone (to make the assistant hear you) + English (United States) [Speech Language Pack] installed

short_description: PAIcom! The funniest and best furry voice computer assistant there is![Also the first furry (protogen) computer assistant in the world!] Using your microphone you can talk to him! He can open apps, games, websites on your computer and much more! (+ he can be fully modded!!!)
